name: Glue Up
description:
Glue Up is a glue your own parkour course! It's that simple! Reach the top by glueing and sticking things to it! Use your creativity and planning skills to reach the top as fast as you can! This game was made for the GMTK Gamejam and the theme was Join Together.


I made pretty much everything within 24hrs, hope everything is ok, Let me know if you got any feedback!
